lexUnit.name: slipper.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a comfortable slip-on shoe, usuall worn indoors

sentence.text: Like Dorothy teetering in her ruby slippers on the brink of the Yellow Brick Road , young Kylie took her first tentative steps towards stardom .
